column5: When I click on "New Content" I'm getting 12 pages of posts? I have selected "Since my last visit" and since I visit a couple of times a day, the 12 pages seems weird to me . Is this happening to anyone else?
don't know why you might have lost your cookies  go to bottom left and click on    Mark Community Read  them mark as read  then see if they stay read

Terry has the right answer. If there are threads that you skip over because you're not interested, they'll show up as unread (new content) unless you mark them as read or you mark that whole forum as read.
Certainly not what the way we used the term "loosing your cookies" 15 years ago....... still couldnt focus on the pages tho
